scripts.dev: npm run deps:all && npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n stack,fe_build 'npm run util:docker-compose-up' 'npm run frontend:build:watch'
scripts.frontend:build: cd frontend && docker build . --build-arg uid=$(id -u) --file Dockerfile-builder --tag frontend_builder && docker run -u node -w='/app' --volume=$(pwd):/app:delegated --rm frontend_builder
scripts.tests: npm run deps:all && npm run beMigrations && npx  concurrently 'npm run feUnitTests' 'npm run beUnitTests && npm run beFunctionalTests'
scripts.deps:all: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'npm run deps:backend' 'npm run deps:frontend'
scripts.feUnitTests: echo 'TO BE IMPLEMENTED' && exit 0; cd frontend && npm run test:cli
scripts.beSeedDB: ECR_PREFIX=216987438199.dkr.ecr.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/finance TAG=latest docker-compose run --rm backend php yii fixture/load "*",
